summary: A hacker known as the Puppet Master is hunted by a female cyborg cop and her partner. This film is a revised version of Ghost in the Shell (1995).
cast: Atsuko Tanaka|Akio Ôtsuka|Kôichi Yamadera|Tesshô Genda|Masato Yamanouchi|Shinji Ogawa|Yoshiko Sakakibara|Kazuhiro Yamaji|Shigeru Chiba|Maaya Sakamoto|Steve Bulen|Gina Connell|Stephen Davis|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Richard Epcar|Michael Forest|Meg Hamilton|Christopher Joyce|William Frederick Knight|Joan Mason|Joe Michael|Gilbert Navarro|Wanda Nowicki|Gloria Oldman|Ben Parks|Scott Prensor|Simon Prescott|Mike Reynolds|Joe Romersa|Donald Salin|Lia Sargent|Kevin Seymour|Sam Sheffer|Michael Sorich|Peter Spellos|Doug Stone|Phil Williams|Amy Wong|Mimi Woods|Tom Wyner
title: Ghost in the Shell 2.0
